member.summary: Types of Emails that can be sent

member.summary: Type of Application this module is being ran from

member.summary: Email Module Class

member.name: P:Simple_Mail.Email.SUBJECT
member.summary: Subject of the Email

member.summary: Body of the Email (default is html)

member.name: P:Simple_Mail.Email.FROM
member.summary: From Email Address (who's sending the email)

member.name: P:Simple_Mail.Email.FROM_NAME
member.summary: From Name (name of who is sending the email)

member.name: P:Simple_Mail.Email.TO
member.summary: To Email Address (who is going to receive this email)

member.name: P:Simple_Mail.Email.TO_NAME
member.summary: To Name (name of who is going to receive this email)

member.name: P:Simple_Mail.Email.USERNAME
member.summary: Username of Smtp Service / Server

member.name: P:Simple_Mail.Email.PASSWORD
member.summary: Password for the smtp service / server

member.name: P:Simple_Mail.Email.PORT
member.summary: The port number for sending the email address (normal ports are 25, 587, 465)

member.name: P:Simple_Mail.Email.USESSL
member.summary: Whether to use SSL Encryption

member.name: P:Simple_Mail.Email.SERVER
member.summary: Uri of the Smtp Server

member.name: P:Simple_Mail.Email.REQUIREAUTH
member.summary: Whether the smtp server requires authentication

member.name: P:Simple_Mail.Email.WEBSITE_NAME
member.summary: Name of the Website or App running the Module
